actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide that candidates for Federal office may not make personal use of excess campaign contributions and other amounts contributed to such candidates.

summary.text: Restricts use of excess campaign contributions to (1) expenses incurred in connection with official duties of Federal office, (2) expenses of future campaigns for Federal office, and (3) charitable contributions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide that candidates for Federal office may not make personal use of excess campaign contributions and other amounts contributed to such candidates.
